data.name: Women of Today
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

The "Women of Today" film by Patty Greer will empower women around the world! Not a movie to be taken lightly, most men will smile too. Award winning filmmaker Patty Greer focuses on a silent element of our present reality long forgotten. Rising like a phoenix Wise Women & their medicine are back as one of the greatest underlying secrets of human evolution. Their wisdom and deep magic are unmatched, as women produce babies and feed them naturally. As men & women unite to create balance ~ grace and peace are easily achieved. Like acupuncture points around the world “Women of Today” heal in all directions. They share remarkable wisdom on how to move gracefully through these trying times; the greatest shift ever in human Evolution! Although the filmmaker claimed this was her first “Non-UFO” movie, three of the women are personally involved in the Mars Mission. You’ll meet 33 unique women including professional dancers, an 88 year old senior Olympian who recently hiked a 100 mile trail, a barefoot runner, a paralegal performing acrobatics dangling from silk ribbons, and a sensual hula hooper. We introduce successful businesswomen triplets with the only all-female brewery in America, a psychotherapist, a Unity Minister, a Muzoetry musician, and a top herbalist. A poet drops classic rhyming lines, and the author of a Cannabis Cookbook shares stimulating recipes. Elder artists, a Native American Grandmother, and a psychic surgeon open up in the film. You'll meet a young mother who gave birth over a yoga ball ~ walking her talk as a prenatal yoga teacher! A beautiful prenatal/postpartum doula with 2 young children, a pregnant belly with henna tattoos, and long dreadlocks shares the best natural baby delivery methods available today. Most of the women will surprise you. These women made a commitment to share conscious wisdom with the world, and promised to assist others along the way. They have all been on task for many years, and none have had it easy getting to where they are today. They are women in all sizes, shapes, colors, and lifestyles who actually care about YOU.

data.short_description: The "Women of Today" film by Patty Greer will empower women around the world. Many men will simply smile. Award winning filmmaker Patty Greer focuses on a silent element of our reality long forgotten... Wise Women & true medicine.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
